text.name: Dimension Shredder
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] At 4+ highest Reson., gain +1 Atk Weight
[BeforeAttack] At less than 10 [[Charge]] Count, consume 15% HP to gain +10 [[Charge]] Count (this damage does not reduce this unit's HP to 0; rounded down)
[BeforeAttack] Consume up to 40 [[Charge]] Count and deal +1% damage for every [[Charge]] Count consumed (max 10%)
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Gain 1 [Agility] and 1 [ChargeLoad] next turn for every [[Charge]] (max 1 of each per Skill)

text.name: Dimension Shredder

[BeforeAttack] Consume up to 40 [[Charge]] Count and deal +1% damage for every [[Charge]] Count consumed (max <style="highlight">20%)
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Gain 1 [Agility] and 1 [ChargeLoad] next turn for every [[Charge]] (max <style="highlight">2 of each per Skill)

text.name: Dimension Shredder
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain <style="highlight">(highest Reson. - 2) Atk Weight <style="highlight">(max 2)
[BeforeAttack] At less than 10 [[Charge]] Count, consume <style="highlight">10% HP to gain +10 [[Charge]] Count (this damage does not reduce this unit's HP to 0; rounded down)
[BeforeAttack] Consume up to 40 [[Charge]] Count and deal +1% damage for every [[Charge]] Count consumed (max <style="highlight">30%)
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Gain 1 [Agility] and 1 [ChargeLoad] next turn for every [[Charge]] (max <style="highlight">3 of each per Skill)

passiveList.name: Rambling Man
passiveList.desc:
Max [Charge] Count +5
Skills that consume [Charge] Count deal +2% damage for every ([Charge] - 1) (max 10%)

text.name: Dimension Shredder
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
[BeforeAttack] At 4+ highest Reson., gain +1 Atk Weight
[BeforeAttack] At less than maximum [[Charge]] Count, consume (missing [[Charge]] Count x 1.5)% HP to gain up to max [[Charge]] Count (max [[Charge]] Count obtainable from this effect: 30. This damage does not reduce this unit's HP to 0; rounded down)
[BeforeAttack] Consume up to 40 [[Charge]] Count and deal +2% damage for every [[Charge]] Count consumed (max 20%)
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Gain 1 [Agility] and 1 [ChargeLoad] next turn for every [[Charge]] (max 2 of each per Skill)

[BeforeAttack] Consume up to 40 [[Charge]] Count and deal +2% damage for every [[Charge]] Count consumed (max <style="highlight">40%)
